resources.string:
"Located in the heart of Cedar City, Cedar Bark Grooming offers a variety of pet grooming" "services, including nails, bath, brush-outs and more.

Its owner and primary"
"groomer Christine Valletta has been in the business for over " "25 years, and offers high-quality service with a smile.

"

"Unlike many pet grooming establishments, Cedar Bark Grooming is based out of the quaint" "and welcoming residence of its owners, Ed and Christine Valletta. Pets feel at ease from" "the moment they walk through the door, which helps them reach the high standard of" "quality that they are known for throughout the region."
Call us at (435)–867–8117 to schedule an appointment.\n(8 AM - 5 PM, Mon - Fri)
Need a reminder to help you remember when you next appointment should be? We\'ve got you covered!
Just enter the purpose of your reminder and the date you\'d like to be reminded on, and you\'re all set!
